components.text: ### File Explorer\nRead-only file manager view with directory tree indicators.
**Legend**\n`▼` expanded directory · `▶` collapsed directory · plain rows are files.

components.code:
▼ .
  ▼ src/
    app.rs
    event.rs
    main.rs
    theme.rs
    ▶ copilot/
    ▶ session/
    ▼ ui/
      catalog.rs
      event.rs
      registry.rs
      runtime.rs
      schema.rs
  ▼ specs/
    base-spec.md
    spec-ui.md
    spec-ui-style.md
  ▼ images/
    Brownie-small.png
    brownie-ui.png
  ▶ target/
  README.md
  Cargo.toml
  Cargo.lock
